title: Should Retailers Split E-Commerce From Stores? A High-Level Debate
sub_head: Saks.com CEO and former chief of Best Buy present views on a strategy some investors are pushing
body:
Macy’s Inc. and Kohl’s Corp. have recently come under pressure from different investors to split off their e-commerce businesses. The activist push follows a decision by the owner of Saks Fifth Avenue in early 2021 to do just that.
The separation has allowed Saks to raise money to fuel its growth as e-commerce has surged during the Covid-19 pandemic. The valuations of other online retailers such as Farfetch Ltd. have exceeded those of more-traditional chains.
